item.title: 新日铁总裁称将与美国商务部就美国钢铁公司竞购展开谈判
item.description: 新日铁总裁今井忠志（Tadashi Imai）周二表示，新日铁将与美国商务部展开谈判，以重启对美国钢铁公司的收购。【原文：Nippon Steel President Tadashi Imai said on Tuesday talks are set to start with the U.S. Department of Commerce as it aims to revive its bid to purchase U.S. Steel .】

item.title: 在特朗普的关税威胁下，美敦力探索优化生产运营的方案
item.description: 医疗设备制造商美敦力公司的一位高管周二告诉路透社，该公司正在研究调整其全球生产布局的方案，以努力减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划所带来的影响。【原文：Medical device maker Medtronic is looking at options to modify its global manufacturing footprint as part of efforts to mitigate any impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans, a company executive told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，印尼与苹果公司就取消 iPhone 16 禁令的条款达成一致
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，印度尼西亚和苹果公司已就解除该国对 iPhone 16 的禁令达成一致。【原文：Indonesia and Apple have agreed on terms to lift the country's ban on iPhone 16s, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 费森尤斯医疗用品公司第四季度业绩略超市场预期
item.description: 本周二，全球最大的透析专业公司费森尤斯医疗用品公司公布了略高于市场预期的第四季度财报，称其医疗服务和医疗使能业务均取得了积极的发展。【原文：Fresenius Medical Care , the world's largest dialysis specialist, reported fourth quarter results slightly above market expectations on Tuesday, citing positive development both in its care delivery and care enablement segments.】

item.title: 联合利华面临减少植物肉暴露的挑战
item.description: 业内专家表示，联合利华可能很难为其植物肉业务吸引到买家，从而使该公司削减不受消费者青睐的产品风险的计划变得更加复杂。【原文：Unilever may struggle to attract buyers for its plant-based meat business, complicating the company's plan to cut its exposure to products which are falling out of favour with consumers, industry experts said.】

item.title: 早间竞价中美科技战愈演愈烈，一片红海
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 路透社调查显示：中国房价将进一步下跌，预计到 2026 年才会复苏
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，尽管政府采取的刺激需求措施有助于脆弱的经济复苏，但中国房地产业的前景已变得更加黯淡，预计到明年价格将趋于稳定。【原文：The outlook for China's property sector has turned gloomier despite expectations of price stabilisation by next year as government measures to boost demand help the fragile recovery, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 欧洲 1 月汽车销量下降，内燃机销量下降超过电动汽车销量增长
item.description: 本周二的行业数据显示，由于欧洲主要市场全电动汽车和混合动力汽车注册量的增长不足以弥补汽油和柴油汽车销量的下降，1月份欧洲新车销量下降了2.1%。【原文：New car sales in Europe were down by 2.1% in January, as a jump in fully electric and hybrid-electric car registrations in its main markets was not enough to compensate for falling petrol and diesel sales, industry data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长将会见美国财政部贝森特，推动关税豁免
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）将于周二在华盛顿会见美国财长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），堪培拉将寻求豁免唐纳德-特朗普总统上个月宣布的对进口钢铁和铝征收的25%关税。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers will meet with his U.S. counterpart Scott Bessent on Tuesday in Washington, with Canberra seeking an exemption on 25% tariffs on imports of steel and aluminium announced by President Donald Trump last month.】

item.title: 美国运通加入中国支付宝数字支付系统
item.description: 美国运通和支付宝周二表示，全球所有美国运通卡会员现在都可以将其美国运通卡与支付宝数字钱包链接，在中国大陆数千万家商户进行支付。【原文：American Express and Alipay on Tuesday said all global American Express card members can now link their cards to the Alipay digital wallet, enabling payments at tens of millions of merchants across mainland China.】

item.title: 越南为规避美国关税正在考虑什么
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已宣布征收关税的计划，这几乎会打击越南对其第一大市场出口的所有商品，根据联合国的数据，去年的出口额超过1420亿美元，约占越南国内生产总值的30%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has announced plans for tariffs that could virtually hit all Vietnam's goods exports to its top market, worth last year more than $142 billion, according to UN data, about 30% of Vietnam's gross domestic product.】

item.title: 越南对美出口占 GDP 的 30%，因此极易受到关税的影响
item.description: 路透社对公开数据的审查显示，去年越南对美国的商品出口占其国内生产总值的30%，是美国最大贸易伙伴中占比最高的国家，这使得越南极易受到互惠关税的影响。【原文：Vietnam's goods exports to the United States accounted for 30% of its gross domestic product last year, the highest share among U.S. top trade partners, a Reuters review of public data shows, making the country highly vulnerable to reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 铁矿石因发货量回升和中国钢铁关税而下跌
item.description: 受铁矿石发货量回升以及中国钢铁出口征税和立法不断增加的影响，铁矿石期货价格周二下跌。【原文：Iron ore futures prices faltered on Tuesday, weighed down by a recovery in iron ore shipments and increasing levies and legislations on Chinese steel exports.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：特朗普团队寻求加强对中国的芯片管制
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，美国官员最近与日本和荷兰官员会面，商讨限制东京电子和ASML的工程师在中国维护半导体设备，以扩大限制中国政府技术实力的努力。【原文：U.S. officials recently met with their Japanese and Dutch counterparts about restricting Tokyo Electron and ASML engineers from maintaining semiconductor gear in China, in a bid to expand efforts to limit Beijing's technological prowess, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 美国制裁伊朗引发供应担忧，油价连续第二天上涨
item.description: 由于美国对中东产油国伊朗实施新的制裁，加剧了市场对供应可能收紧的担忧，周二油价连续第二天上涨。【原文：Oil prices rose for a second day on Tuesday as the U.S. imposed fresh sanctions on Middle Eastern producer Iran that increased concerns supply might tighten.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因美国遏制中国而下滑，欧元回吐涨幅
item.description: 周二，由于担心美国对中国的投资限制，亚洲股市下滑，而欧元涨势减弱，因为投资者在等待德国在不出现重大意外的情况下完成新政府的组建。【原文：Asian shares slid on Tuesday amid worries about U.S. investment curbs on China, while a run-up in the euro faded as investors wait for Germany to sort out the formation of its new government with no major surprises.】

item.title: 台湾经济部未收到任何有关台积电投资英特尔、美国
item.description: 台湾经济部长周二在被问及台湾芯片制造商台积电可能在英特尔和美国投资时表示，台湾经济部尚未收到有关台积电海外投资申请的信息。【原文：Taiwan's economy minister said on Tuesday his ministry had not received information about an overseas investment application by Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC , when asked about possible investment in Intel and the United States.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Zip 因强劲的年度预测和上半年现金收益而上涨
item.description: 周二，Zip Co 的股价攀升了近 16%，这家总部位于澳大利亚的数字金融服务公司称其上半年现金收益增长了一倍多，并发布了年度盈利预测，超出了一致预期。【原文：Shares of Zip Co climbed nearly 16% on Tuesday after the Australia-based digital financial services firm said its first-half cash earnings more than doubled, and released its annual earnings forecast, which exceeded consensus expectations.】

item.title: 关税忧虑再起，美元收复跌幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将按计划对墨西哥和加拿大征收关税后，美元受到避险资金流动的提振，在本周初跌至两个多月来的最低点后于周二上涨。【原文：The dollar rose on Tuesday after falling to its lowest in more than two months at the start of the week, buoyed by safe-haven flows after U.S. President Donald Trump said tariffs on Mexico and Canada would proceed as planned.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，马斯克希望在美国空域网络部署星链终端
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司正寻求部署 Starlink 卫星互联网终端，以加快支持美国联邦航空管理局国家空域系统的信息技术网络。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX is looking to deploy Starlink satellite internet terminals to speed up the information technology networks that support the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration's national airspace system, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 多米诺比萨企业因销售势头放缓和上半年利润不佳而下跌
item.description: 澳大利亚多米诺比萨企业周二股价下跌超过 11%，此前这家比萨连锁店运营商公布上半年利润下降，下半年前七周同店销售势头放缓。【原文：Shares of Australia's Domino's Pizza Enterprises dropped more than 11% on Tuesday, after the pizza chain operator posted lower first-half profit and a slowdown in same-store sales momentum in the first seven weeks of the second half.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，随着中国企业采用 DeepSeek 的人工智能模型，英伟达的 H20 芯片订单猛增
item.description: 六位熟悉内情的人士称，由于对 DeepSeek 低成本人工智能模型的需求旺盛，中国公司正在增加对英伟达 H20 人工智能芯片的订单。【原文：Chinese companies are ramping up orders for Nvidia's H20 artificial intelligence chip due to booming demand for DeepSeek's low-cost AI models, six people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日本贸易公司股价受巴菲特言论影响大涨
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）表示，他的企业集团伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）可能会增持日本五大贸易公司的股票，日本五大贸易公司的股票在周二早盘交易中上涨超过 5%。【原文：Shares in Japan's five major trading houses rose more than 5% in early trade on Tuesday after billionaire investor Warren Buffett said his conglomerate Berkshire Hathaway would likely increase its ownership in them.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特斯拉将在中国为软件添加城市导航功能
item.description: 据特斯拉公司的一份通知和两位知情人士透露，特斯拉计划在中国更新汽车软件，增加辅助驾驶功能，帮助驾驶员在城市道路上导航。【原文：Tesla plans to update software in cars in China to add driving-assistance capabilities that will help drivers navigate city streets, according to a company notification and two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 古尔斯比表示，美联储在重新开始降息前需要更多明确信息
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周一表示，美国央行目前正处于 "观望 "状态，需要进一步明确特朗普政府的新政策（包括关税、移民、减税、削减政府开支、裁减联邦工作人员等）对经济的总体影响，然后才能采取行动。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee on Monday said the U.S. central bank is currently in a "wait-and-see" mode and needs more clarity on the total economic impact of the Trump administration's new policies including tariffs, immigration, tax cuts, government spending cuts, federal workforce reductions and others before it can act.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构推动市场运营商 ASX 提高收费透明度和加强竞争
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周二表示，为促进竞争，该国股市运营商将被要求公布与外国供应商的清算和结算费用比较，并说明任何费用增长的理由。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Tuesday the country's stock market operator would be required to publish a comparison of clearing and settlement fees against foreign providers and justify any fee increases, in a bid to promote competition.】

item.title: 制药公司因Stelara生物仿制药合同违约起诉三星Bioepis公司
item.description: 强生（Johnson & Johnson）周一表示，该公司已对三星生物医药公司（Samsung Bioepis）提起诉讼，指控其违反了与该制药商就推出强生公司自身免疫药物 Stelara 的生物仿制药所达成的合同协议。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Monday it had filed a lawsuit against Samsung Bioepis for breaching its contract agreement with the drugmaker over the launch of a biosimilar to Stelara, J&J's autoimmune drug.】

item.title: 英特尔称首批两台新型 ASML 机器已投入生产，并取得积极成果
item.description: 英特尔公司周一表示，ASML Holding 公司的首批两台尖端设备已在其工厂 "投入生产"，早期数据显示它们比上一代设备更加可靠。【原文：Intel on Monday said that the first two cutting-edge machines from ASML Holding are "in production" at its factories, with early data indicating they are more reliable than the previous generation of machines.】

item.title: 副总统表示，圭亚那将在 3 月底之前等待埃克森公司的天然气开发计划
item.description: 圭亚那副总统告诉路透社记者，圭亚那政府希望由美国石油巨头埃克森美孚牵头的财团能在 3 月底之前向官员们介绍开发近海天然气的计划。【原文：Guyana's government expects a consortium led by U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil to brief officials by the end of March on plans to develop offshore gas, the country's vice president told Reuters.】

item.title: 油气价格疲软，伍德赛德能源公司年度利润创三年新低
item.description: 澳大利亚石油和天然气巨头伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周二公布了其三年来最小的年度基本利润，这主要是受到实际价格下跌的影响，但由于预期液化天然气需求强劲，该公司维持了 2025 年的产量预期。【原文：Australian oil and gas major Woodside Energy reported its smallest annual underlying profit in three years on Tuesday, hurt by lower realised prices, but maintained its 2025 output forecast on expectations of strong demand for liquefied natural gas.】
